# CareerFairy Student Career Portal

> CareerFairy is an interactive platform designed to connect students with leading employers through live streams, curated job listings, and authentic company insights. Our mission is to empower students to discover, explore, and secure their ideal career paths by providing direct access to company culture, real-world experiences, and job opportunities.

CareerFairy offers a unique blend of live events, up-to-date job listings, and daily video content ("Sparks") to help students make informed career decisions. Students can attend live Q&A sessions with company representatives, browse open positions, and watch short videos showcasing company culture and employee experiences. The platform is designed for maximum engagement, transparency, and accessibility, ensuring students have the resources they need to launch their careers.

## Platform Structure

- **Live Streams:** Interactive sessions where students can meet employers, ask questions, and see company presentations in real time.
- **Job Listings:** Continuously updated database of internships, graduate programs, and full-time positions from a wide range of companies.
- **Sparks:** Short, daily videos offering authentic glimpses into company life, team dynamics, and workplace culture.
- **Company Profiles:** In-depth pages for each employer, featuring upcoming events, job openings, and Sparks.
- **Personalized Recommendations:** AI-driven suggestions for jobs and events based on student interests and activity.
- **Resource Center:** Guides, articles, and tips to help students with applications, interviews, and career planning.
- **Student Profiles:** Each student can create and manage a detailed profile, including study background, languages, interests, and more (see below).
- **Partnerships:** Universities, student associations, and companies can partner with CareerFairy to reach and engage students (see below).

## Student Profiles

- [Manage Your Profile](https://careerfairy.io/profile): Students can create and update their personal profile, including:
  - **Study Background:** Add universities attended, countries, fields and levels of study, and study dates.
  - **Languages:** List spoken languages and proficiency levels.
  - **Interests:** Select business functions and content topics of interest.
  - **Links:** Add LinkedIn and other relevant links.
  - **Job Preferences:** Indicate job-seeking status and areas of interest.
  - **Newsletter & Engagement:** Subscribe to updates and track engagement with companies and events.

## Live Events

- [Upcoming Live Streams](https://careerfairy.io/events): Calendar of all scheduled live sessions with companies.
- [Past Events Archive](https://careerfairy.io/events/archive): Watch recordings of previous live streams and Q&A sessions.
- [How Live Streams Work](https://careerfairy.io/help/live-streams): Guide to participating in live events and interacting with employers.

## Job Listings

- [All Job Opportunities](https://careerfairy.io/jobs): Browse and filter open positions by company, role, location, and more.
- [Personalized Job Matches](https://careerfairy.io/jobs/matches): View jobs recommended for you based on your profile and interests.
- [Application Tips](https://careerfairy.io/resources/apply): Best practices for applying to jobs through CareerFairy.

## Sparks (Company Videos)

- [Latest Sparks](https://careerfairy.io/sparks): Daily short videos from companies, showcasing real workplace moments and culture.
- [Browse by Company](https://careerfairy.io/companies): Explore Sparks and job listings by employer.
- [Submit a Spark](https://careerfairy.io/companies/submit-spark): For companies to share their own videos.

## Benefits of Using CareerFairy

- **For Students:**
  - Direct access to real company employees and authentic workplace insights.
  - Personalized job and event recommendations based on your profile.
  - Build a comprehensive profile to showcase your background, languages, and interests to employers.
  - Access to a wide range of companies, industries, and career resources.
  - Community support and success stories from fellow students.
- **For Partners (Universities, Companies, Associations):**
  - Reach and engage a highly targeted student audience.
  - Promote your brand and opportunities through interactive events and content.
  - Gather actionable feedback and analytics on student engagement.
  - Streamline event logistics and communication with students.
  - Enhance your recruitment and employer branding efforts.
